answerText: azides[10] Azides contain three of this element with atomic number 7. Other functional groups containing it include amines and imines. Its diatomic gaseous form has a triple bond.

subject: Science
question: Question: The acyl variety of this functional group is rearranged into an isocyanate in the Curtius rearrangement. For 10 points each: [10] Name this functional group which is usually used as a sodium salt. This anion is the conjugate base of hydrazoic acid and contains just a single element.
